question: Question #426: What is the primary goal of solution evaluation?
options: A. To verify that the solution meets requirements
B. To identify defects in the solution
C. To assess the value delivered by the solution
D. To determine if the solution is technically feasible

question: Question #427: Which perspective is most important when defining the solution scope?
Question #428: What is the key characteristic of a good business case?
options: A. It provides technical implementation details
B. It justifies the investment in business terms
C. It includes detailed project schedules
D. It describes all possible risks

question: Question #429: Which activity is part of the Strategy Analysis knowledge area?
Question #430: What is the primary purpose of requirements traceability?
options: C. To ensure requirements are linked to business objectives and solution components
